channel.title: Offworlders: Tannhäuser Gate
channel.description:
A new life awaits you in the off-world colonies! A chance to begin again in a golden land of opportunity and adventure!
"Tannhäuser Gate" is an Offworlders campaign. Offworlders (by Chris Wolf) is a science fiction roleplaying game about adventurers, outlaws, and guns for hire making their fortune on the rough end of the galaxy. It is designed to be straightforward enough to pick up and be ready to play in just a few minutes as a one-off game, but with enough meat to play a short campaign as well.
This series will run in four 3-hour sessions in August. Signing up for all three sessions is encouraged but not a requirement. Sessions will be recorded, but not posted without consent of the players at the end of the session.
We'll use safety tools such as the X-Card, script change, and Open Door policy. There will be a tone discussion at the start of each session.
